San Francisco, CA (Financial District) -- Software Engineer (Growth Team) -- Full-time (H1B possible)

Prezi: http://prezi.com/

Our mission is to help people share ideas. Currently we're helping 20 million people (and adding 1M+/month). We have been cash flow positive since day one, and we're also backed by Accel Partners.

If you're excited about big data, and growth hacks, we'd love to talk to you. Our stack is Python/Django based on the web, and we're using Hadoop to build a data warehouse.

Learn more about what it's like to work at Prezi: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q-DGGNzvXAs

You can drop me a line at szilveszter@prezi.com, or apply here: http://hire.jobvite.com/j/?cj=oIK4Vfwb&s=Hacker_News
